snippet: The new accusations of sexual harassment may be the most damaging yet for the mayor, Bob Filner, because they come from a constituency to which he has devoted much time.
abstract: New allegations of sexual harassment surface against San Diego Mayor Bob Filner, this time from several female veterans, constituency to which he has devoted much of his time in public service; Filner has stepped away from city politics to attend a two-week behavior treatment program, but his absence from City Hall has not stemmed tide of allegations against him.
lead_paragraph: The new accusations of sexual harassment may be the most damaging yet for the mayor, Bob Filner, because they come from a constituency to which he has devoted much time.

headline.main: San Diego Mayor Faces New Claims, From Veterans
headline.print_headline: Mayor Faces New Claims, From Veterans
